title: How to Wear a Tube Sarong (Men)

steps.title: Step into the sarong or draw it over your head.
steps.content: Step into the sarong or draw it over your head. Turn the sarong until the dark stripe is towards your back side. Hold the top open at waist level. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Pull the sarong tight against one side of your body, and stretch the sarong out away from your other side.
steps.content: Pull the sarong tight against one side of your body, and stretch the sarong out away from your other side. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Draw the excess cloth back across the front of your body, pulling it tightly up against your waist.
steps.content: Draw the excess cloth back across the front of your body, pulling it tightly up against your waist. It helps if you hold the inner fold against your body with one hand as you draw the front to the other side of your body with the other hand. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Pull the folded cloth back against your opposite hip and hold it tightly against your body.
steps.content: Pull the folded cloth back against your opposite hip and hold it tightly against your body. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Roll the top of the sarong down over itself to the front.
steps.content: Roll the top of the sarong down over itself to the front. Do this several times. The tighter the roll, the easier it will be to keep the sarong on. It's best if the final roll ends up above the hips. [5] X Research source
